00019     QLearningController::QLearningController(Approximator* approx, Policy* policy, double tdDiscount) : ValueController(approx) {
00020 
00021         this->policy = policy;
00022         this->tdDiscount = tdDiscount;
00023 
00024         greedyPolicy = new eGreedyPolicy(0.0);
00025         dist.resize(approx->getOutputDim());
00026         lastDist.resize(approx->getOutputDim());
00027 
00028     }
00029

00034     QLearningController::~QLearningController() {

00036     }

00045     void QLearningController::getAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action,  bool computeGrad) {
00046 
00047 
00048         assert(action.size() == 1);
00049     
00050         // greedyAct has same dimention as action
00051         greedyAct.resize(action.size());
00052 
00053         // Learn by experience?
00054         this->computeGrad = computeGrad;
00055 
00056         // Get state-action values for this state
00057         approx->doApprox(obs, dist);
00058 
00059         // Get next action according to policy
00060         policy->getAction(dist, action, obs);
00061 
00062         // Get greedy action
00063         greedyPolicy->getAction(dist, greedyAct, obs);
00064 
00065         // Temporal difference error calculation
00066         if (obs.getSteps() <= 1)
00067             error = 0.0;
00068         else {
00069 
00070             approx->doApprox(lastObs, lastDist);
00071             error = lastRew + tdDiscount * dist((int)greedyAct[0]) - lastDist(lastAct);
00072         }
00073     
00074         // Recall last action and observation
00075         lastAct = (int)action[0];
00076         lastObs = obs;
00077     }
00078 
00079 
00083     void QLearningController::discountTrace() {
00084         if (computeGrad) {
00085             if (lastAct == (int)greedyAct[0]) approx->discountTrace();
00086             else approx->resetTrace();
00087             dist.clear();
00088             dist[lastAct] = 1.0;
00089             approx->feedbackGrad(lastObs, dist);
00090         }
00091     }
00092 
00093 
00094     void QLearningController::instantStep(Vector& reward) {
00095         if (computeGrad) {
00096             lastRew = reward[0];
00097             approx->instantStep(error);
00098         }
00099     }
00100

00102     void QLearningController::setDiscount(double lambda) {
00103         this->lambda = lambda;
00104         approx->setDiscount(tdDiscount*lambda);
00105     }
